title: Phase operator for the photon, an index theorem, and quantum anomaly
abstract: An index relation $dim\ ker\ a - dim\ ker\ a^{\dagger} = 1$ is satisfied by the creation and annihilation operators $a^{\dagger}$ and $a$ of a harmonic oscillator. Implications of this analytic index on the possible form of the phase operator are discussed. A close analogy between the present phase operator problem and chiral anomaly in gauge theory, which is associated with Atiyah-Singer index theorem, is emphasized.
